item.title: A strange QSql Driver error
item.description: This is a post meant to be found on Google by people having the same problem, hopefully this will save them some time. QSql Drivers I spent at least 3 hours playing with QSql drivers, source code, DLLs and googling around in order to get rid of an annoying error : After recompiling the qmysql drivers, therefore reinstalling MySQL & going through the pain of installing MS Visual Studio because it looked like Qt needed it to compile its qmysql driver (while it actually doesn’t ; you can compile it using MinGW) I was finally able to tackle the problem!
